column3:
Sorry. Something came
up, so I'll ask later!
Take this for sticking
with me this long!

Reinforcements requested
on the Road to Unification!
The battle begins now!

Would you kindly come to
a poor Cat's aid? If you do, you'll
get a huge
Cat Food reward!

Truly?!
Thank you!

At this very moment,
the Cat Army is striving
to unite the Empire!

But the current might
of our forces alone isn't
enough to make that happen.

So, we humbly request
you recruit your
friends to the cause!

If you have friends
that haven't played or played
long ago but stopped,
they're all welcome!

The Battle Cats will be here for
a long time to come, so
share the fun with friends!
Did you get all that?

I hope you'll tell a
bunch of your friends!

Or you can tell a friend
about the game directly!

Let's grow the Cat Army
together! A promise made
with a Cat ought never
be broken, after all!

I'll have your Cat Food
reward ready by tomorrow,
so drop by again then!

Well, uhh...
See you then!

Sorry for acting all highfalutin'!
I'll cut it out with all
the regal speak, so
listen to my request!

I'll explain it all
one more time!

You're back!
Did ya tell all your friends
about the Cat Army?

Really?! Truly?!
I'm so glad to have a
trustworthy pal like you!

I hope you'll keep up
this energy and spread
the word to more friends!

For keeping your
promise to me, here's
your Cat Food reward.
Well, here it is...!

Huh... That's not
Cat Food.
It's a bag of... rice?

I messed up!
I grabbed the
rice rations for the
Cat Army by mistake!

Once again, I've left
the Cat Food at home...

Don't be sad.
I PROMISE to bring
it tomorrow, okay?!

I'll whisper reminders
to myself on my
way home to keep
myself from forgetting!

Don't worry!
I've NEVER forgotten
after doing this!

Well, since I have
this rice already, I
might as well make
onigiri for everyone!

Hope they're all hungry!
Be back soon!

But I'd sure like it
if you told a few more
friends in the meantime!
See you tomorrow!

Don't forget to tell
your friends!

Could you do me
this one last favor?

Thanks a lot!
I'm trusting you!

I'll give you a
Cat Food reward for
making this promise!

I'm trusting you that
you actually will invite
your friends to play!

This Cat Food is a
symbol of that trust!

Thanks for coming
by today as always!

Did you invite your
friends to become
allies of the Cat Army?

That's great news!
Everyone should have
a friend like you!

Were they having
fun fighting alongside us Cats?
Did they earn a victory?

I'm moved!
I'm glad that your
friends enjoyed it!

You always pull through
when asked to
do something!

Now, for your Cat Food
reward...

...is what I'd
like to say, but...
I have something
to ask you first.

I want you to invite
just ONE more
friend! Pretty please!

I'd have my 100th friend
if you did that!

My dream is to
feed a group of 100
friends 100 onigiri each!

Just need one more
friend to make that
dream come true!

This is my final request!
I'll bring the Cat Food
reward for you
tomorrow for sure!

I'm counting on you!
See you tomorrow!

Oh... did you forget
your promise...?

You promised to have
your friends join the
Cat Army and work
toward world domination!
Did you really forget?

Were you just telling me
what I wanted to hear
until now?

Do you REALLY remember
your promise?

Well, I believe you! But I
want you see you here
with your friend tomorrow!

World domination can
only happen if we
work together!

I believe you'll
invite your friend, so
here's your Cat Food reward!

Hey! Listen to
what I say!

I am sad... but I won't
let it get me down!

The Battle Cats is
like beef jerky.

Like jerky that tastes
better the more you chew,
the game gets better
the more you play!

So I hope you'll tell
you friends all about
how fun the game is!

But I am glad that
you invited your
friend! Really!

You've done it!
I have your Cat Food
reward here!

A gift for inviting
your friend! Thank
you so much!

The Cat Army has
been so motivated
lately! Just full of pep
all day long!

And I've made so
many new friends!

If we keep going like this,
then world domination
is within our grasp!

I can't believe that the
world is almost ours! I've
dreamed of that day!

You'll stick with us
until the very end,
right?

Great! You're truly my
best friend! We'll rule
the world together!

I'm glad that you
listened to my requests
over these last
few days!

So many people have
started playing because
you asked them to!

And now... here's the
Cat Food reward you've
been waiting for!

I'm really REALLY
serious this time!

Here it is!
777 Cat Food!
All for you!

Hm?
I didn't hear you.
I'll ask again.
